name: megera-lambda
description: Lambda handler para skill Alexa integrando com ChatGPT (OpenAI)

scripts.deploy: zip -r function.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name megera-chatgpt --zip-file fileb://function.zip ${AWS_PROFILE:+--profile ${AWS_PROFILE}}
